text: Let's not dwell on the heavy traffic, let's rather think of the families who lost their loved 1s & those still in hospital #BridgeCollapse
@imanrappetti remember the Chinese labour issue once raised by Sfiso from RTB? Now Zim labourers exploited, bridge collapse, DEP.of LABOUR??
thing is with the bridge collapse, the major construction companies rarely suffer recourse, the little guys are condemned and banned
